Name: 66173751-7f56-4ccf-9bd0-9d4e3d236a3c
Query:
let suspiciousDomains = DeviceNetworkEvents
| where ActionType contains "dns"
| extend QueryName = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalFields).query)
| extend QueryType = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalFields).qtype_name)
| where QueryType has_any ("TXT", "A")
| extend Subdomains = split(QueryName, ".")
| where array_length(Subdomains) > 3 //we may change it to 2
| extend ChildDomain = Subdomains[0]
| extend ParentDomain = extract(@"([^.]+\.[^.]+)$", 1, QueryName)
| where strlen(ChildDomain) > 25  // we may change it to lesser but felt that 25 is good for noq
| where ChildDomain matches regex @"^[0-9a-fA-F]+$" or ChildDomain matches regex @"^[A-Za-z0-9+/=]+$" // looking for encoded or hexa strings, cna eb changed for a better regex
| extend Decoded = base64_decode_tostring(tostring(ChildDomain))
| project DeviceName, QueryName, ParentDomain, Subdomains, AdditionalFields, TimeGenerated, QueryType, ChildDomain, Decoded;
let parentSeenBefore = DeviceNetworkEvents
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d) and TimeGenerated <= ago(1d)
| extend QueryName = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalFields).query)
| extend ParentDomain = extract(@"([^.]+\.[^.]+)$", 1, QueryName)
| summarize LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated) by ParentDomain;
let fullDomainSeenLast1Day = DeviceNetworkEvents
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
| extend QueryName = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalFields).query)
| summarize LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated) by QueryName;
suspiciousDomains
| join kind=inner fullDomainSeenLast1Day on QueryName
| join kind=leftanti parentSeenBefore on ParentDomain    
| project DeviceName, QueryName, ParentDomain, Subdomains, AdditionalFields, TimeGenerated, QueryType, ChildDomain, Decoded
| order by TimeGenerated desc
